speaker: Agent
text: Thank you for calling technical support. My name is Jennifer Miller. To get started, could you please provide your date of birth and ZIP code for verification?

speaker: Customer
text: Hi, this is Adrian Miller. My DOB is May 15, 1985, and the zip is 10,000. My internet keeps dropping out.

speaker: Customer
text: It only started after my router got that new 3.14.2 firmware update.

speaker: Agent
text: I understand your internet is dropping since the firmware update, Adrian. I'm seeing intermittent connectivity issues on our end; let's try reverting your router's firmware.
